caption:
Table 3. Here we set input resolution to 
32 ? 100 and no data augmentation is used for fair com-
parison, other settings are the same as described in Section 
5.2. The average accuracy of CE loss is almost the same as 
CTC loss which indicates that the intermediate process of 
alignment between the input and the output is unneces-
sary.
